Question
========

Every year *Forbes Magazine* publishes a list of the most earning deceased celebrities. In 2008, the top six and their annual earnings:*

1.  Elvis Presley, __.$ 52 miljoen
2.  Charles M. Schulz, \$ 33 million 3.  Heath Ledger, eds.$ 20 miljoen
4.  Albert Einstein, \$ 18 million 5.  Aaron Spelling, eds.$ 15 miljoen
6.  Dr. Seuss (Theodor Geisel), \$ 12 million. *Source: www.forbes.com

Your office will have the opportunity to represent two of these celebrities. represent. The two will be chosen at random. You will be paid 10% of their earnings paid. What is the probability that you will be will be paid?

Answerlist
----------

* 1/15
* 5/15
* 6/15
* 7/85

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1/15: Incorrect
* 5/15: Correct
* 6/15: Incorrect
* 7/85: Incorrect
